Name: proto
Description: Transaction protocol

Name: state
Description: Indicates the state and its dependent protocol, e.g. ACC, CLO, CON, ECO, ECR, FIN, INT, MAS, PAR, REQ, RST, TST, TXD, URH, URN, and (-) if not used

Name: dur
Description: Record total duration

Name: sbytes
Description: Source to destination transaction bytes

Name: dbytes
Description: Destination to source transaction bytes

Name: rate
Description: Ethernet data rates transmitted and received

Name: sttl
Description: Source to destination time to live value

Name: dttl
Description: Destination to source time to live value

Name: sloss
Description: Source packets retransmitted or dropped

Name: dloss
Description: Destination packets retransmitted or dropped

Name: service
Description: http, ftp, smtp, ssh, dns, ftp-data, irc, and (-) if not used

Name: sload
Description: Source bits per second

Name: dload
Description: Destination bits per second

Name: spkts
Description: Source to destination packet count

Name: dpkts
Description: Destination to source packet count

Name: swin
Description: Source TCP window advertisement value

Name: dwin
Description: Destination TCP window advertisement value

Name: stcpb
Description: Source TCP base sequence number

Name: dtcpb
Description: Destination TCP base sequence number

Name: smean
Description: Mean of the flow packet size transmitted by the source

Name: dmean
Description: Mean of the flow packet size transmitted by the destination

Name: trans_depth
Description: HTTP pipelined request/response depth

Name: response_body_len
Description: Uncompressed content size of the HTTP response body

Name: sjit
Description: Source jitter (ms)

Name: djit
Description: Destination jitter (ms)

Name: sinpkt
Description: Source interpacket arrival time (ms)

Name: dinpkt
Description: Destination interpacket arrival time (ms)

Name: tcprtt
Description: TCP connection setup round-trip time (synack + ackdat)

Name: synack
Description: TCP connection setup time between SYN and SYN_ACK

Name: ackdat
Description: TCP connection setup time between SYN_ACK and ACK

Name: is_sm_ips_ports
Description: 1 if source and destination IPs and ports are equal, else 0

Name: ct_state_ttl
Description: No. for each state (6), according to specific TTL values (10, 11)

Name: ct_flw_http_mthd
Description: Count of flows using HTTP methods (GET/POST)

Name: is_ftp_login
Description: 1 if FTP session includes user+password, else 0

Name: ct_ftp_cmd
Description: Count of flows with FTP commands

Name: ct_srv_src
Description: Connections with same service and source IP in last 100 connections

Name: ct_srv_dst
Description: Connections with same service and destination IP in last 100 connections

Name: ct_dst_ltm
Description: Connections with same destination IP in last 100 connections

Name: ct_src_ltm
Description: Connections with same source IP in last 100 connections

Name: ct_src_dport_ltm
Description: Connections with same source IP and destination port in last 100 connections

Name: ct_dst_sport_ltm
Description: Connections with same destination IP and source port in last 100 connections

Name: ct_dst_src_ltm
Description: Connections with same source and destination IPs in last 100 connections

Name: attack_cat
Description: Attack category (Fuzzers, Analysis, Backdoor, DoS, Exploits, Generic, Reconnaissance, Shellcode, Worms

Name: label
Description: 0 = normal, 1 = attack
